details.title: On Optimal Allocation and Guidance Laws for Linear lnterception and Rendezvous Problems
details.abstract: This paper considers the problem of guiding N interceptors so that they intercept or rendezvous with N targets at the same time T. It is assumed that the interceptors and targets are described by linear time-varying differential equations (deterministic or stochastic). Under certain assumptions both the optimal (static or dynamic) interceptor-target allocation and the guidance of each interceptor for the optimal allocation can be obtained with modest real-time and storage computer requirements.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
